title: Avengers: Endgame
plot: The Avengers assemble once more to undo the damage caused by Thanos in their previous battle and save the universe.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
plot: Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange to erase his secret identity but inadvertently opens the multiverse.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
plot: Batman faces a new threat in the form of the masked terrorist Bane, who plans to destroy Gotham City.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plot: Max teams up with a mysterious woman to escape a post-apocalyptic wasteland while being pursued by a cult leader.

title: Frozen
plot: When their kingdom is trapped in eternal winter, two sisters must work together to break the curse and save their home.

title: The Revenant
plot: A frontiersman on a quest for survival after being left for dead must fight his way through a brutal wilderness.

title: The Social Network
plot: The story of Facebook's creation and its founder Mark Zuckerberg's rise to power amid personal and professional struggles.

title: The Hunger Games
plot: In a dystopian future, a young girl volunteers to take her sister's place in a televised fight to the death.

title: La La Land
plot: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: Wonder Woman
plot: When an American pilot crashes on their secluded island, Diana, an Amazonian princess, leaves her home to fight in World War I.

title: Joker
plot: A failed comedian is driven insane and becomes the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

title: The Lion King
plot: Simba, a young lion, must embrace his destiny as king after the death of his father.

title: Shazam!
plot: A teenager is granted the ability to transform into an adult superhero by uttering the magic word 'Shazam!'

title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
plot: A prequel animated film exploring the origin story of Geralt's mentor, Vesemir, and the world of the Witchers.

title: Black Panther
plot: T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king, only to face a new adversary.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
plot: The Avengers must unite to prevent the powerful Thanos from collecting the Infinity Stones and wiping out half the universe.

title: Parasite
plot: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family, leading to a series of events that upend both families.

title: Interstellar
plot: A group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival on a distant planet.

title: Toy Story 4
plot: Woody and Buzz Lightyear try to rescue Forky, a new toy who feels he doesn't belong in the world of toys.

title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
plot: A group of rebels steal the Death Star plans to help bring down the evil Galactic Empire.

title: Deadpool
plot: A former special forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers.

title: Skyfall
plot: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her, threatening her life and the MI6 agency.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
plot: The Guardians are once again called upon to protect the universe, but family secrets and a new threat complicate their mission.

title: A Quiet Place
plot: In a world where creatures hunt by sound, a family must live in silence to survive.

title: Tenet
plot: A secret agent embarks on a dangerous journey to prevent World War III, using time manipulation as his weapon.

title: Zootopia
plot: A bunny cop and a fox con artist work together to uncover a conspiracy in a city populated by anthropomorphic animals.

title: The Incredibles 2
plot: The Incredibles family returns, with Elastigirl leading a campaign to bring superheroes back to the forefront while Mr. Incredible stays at home.

title: Coco
plot: A young boy embarks on an extraordinary journey to the Land of the Dead to discover his family's history and follow his passion for music.

title: The Greatest Showman
plot: P.T. Barnum creates the famous circus in this musical, following the challenges and triumphs of building a worldwide spectacle.

title: Justice League
plot: Batman and Wonder Woman assemble a team of superheroes to save the world from Steppenwolf and his army of Parademons.

title: John Wick
plot: A retired hitman seeks vengeance against those who wronged him, with relentless determination and brutal combat skills.

title: A Star is Born
plot: A seasoned musician helps a young singer find fame while his career is in decline, leading to personal and professional challenges.

title: The Mandalorian
plot: A lone bounty hunter makes his way through the galaxy, encountering various challenges while protecting a mysterious child.

title: Shutter Island
plot: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a patient from a mental institution, uncovering shocking truths in the process.

title: Knives Out
plot: A detective investigates the death of a wealthy patriarch during a family gathering, uncovering dark secrets within the family.

title: Blade Runner 2049
plot: A new blade runner uncovers a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos.

title: The Maze Runner
plot: A group of teens is trapped in a maze with no memory of the outside world and must work together to escape.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
plot: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down stolen plutonium while facing a new threat from the mysterious criminal group known as the Apostles.

title: Bird Box
plot: A mother and her two children must find safety after a mysterious force decimates the population, leaving them to navigate the world blindfolded.

title: Dune
plot: Paul Atreides leads a noble family to the desert planet Arrakis, where they must fight for survival against treacherous forces.

title: Venom
plot: Eddie Brock, a journalist, becomes the host for an alien symbiote, granting him extraordinary powers and a monstrous alter-ego.

title: The Witch
plot: A Puritan family in 17th century New England is torn apart by suspicion, paranoia, and an evil presence lurking in the woods.

title: It
plot: A group of children must confront their fears and defeat an ancient evil that takes the form of a clown named Pennywise.

title: The Equalizer
plot: A former black-ops operative seeks redemption by helping those who cannot protect themselves.

title: Logan
plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an aging Logan must protect a young girl with extraordinary powers from deadly forces.

title: The Lego Movie
plot: An ordinary Lego mini-figure is mistaken for the special one, destined to save the Lego universe from an evil tyrant.

title: The Secret Life of Pets
plot: Max, a Jack Russell Terrier, enjoys his life in New York City until his owner adopts a large, unruly mutt named Duke.

title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
plot: Bilbo Baggins embarks on an unexpected journey to help a group of dwarves reclaim their homeland from a dragon.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
plot: A mild-mannered man escapes his ordinary life through daydreams, but soon embarks on a real-life adventure to find a missing photograph.

title: Pacific Rim
plot: As giant monsters known as Kaiju emerge from the ocean, humanity fights back by piloting massive robots to protect the Earth.

title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
plot: A street-smart teenager is recruited into a secret spy organization and trained to become a highly skilled agent.

title: The Croods
plot: In a prehistoric world, a family of cavemen must venture into the unknown after their home is destroyed, facing challenges and discoveries.

title: The Fate of the Furious
plot: Dominic Toretto and his team face a new threat when a cyberterrorist blackmails Dom into working against his family.

title: Frozen II
plot: Elsa, Anna, Kristoff, and Olaf journey into the unknown to find the source of Elsa's powers and save their kingdom.

title: The Conjuring
plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family being terrorized by a dark force in their farmhouse.

title: Deadpool 2
plot: Deadpool forms a team of mutants to protect a young boy from a dangerous time-traveling soldier, Cable.

title: The Jungle Book
plot: A young boy raised by wolves must face his fears and confront the evil tiger Shere Khan in the jungle.

title: The Angry Birds Movie
plot: The birds of Bird Island must come together to fight a green pig invasion that threatens their peaceful lives.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 2
plot: Harry Potter and his friends make their final stand against Lord Voldemort as the wizarding world prepares for the ultimate battle.

title: Logan Lucky
plot: Two brothers plan a heist during a NASCAR race, aiming to steal money from the Charlotte Motor Speedway.

title: The Martian
plot: Stranded on Mars, an astronaut uses his ingenuity and knowledge to survive while awaiting rescue.

title: The Meg
plot: A deep-sea submersible is attacked by a massive prehistoric shark, forcing a rescue mission to prevent a catastrophe.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
plot: Peter Parker faces a new challenge when a mysterious villain named Mysterio threatens his vacation with friends across Europe.

title: Iron Man
plot: Billionaire Tony Stark builds a powerful suit of armor and becomes the superhero Iron Man, taking on enemies both technological and human.

title: The Incredibles
plot: A family of superheroes must come out of hiding to save the world from an evil mastermind, all while balancing their family life.

title: Alita: Battle Angel
plot: A cyborg named Alita is discovered and awakens with no memory, beginning a journey to find her past and understand her true purpose.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
plot: After more than thirty years of service, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
plot: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the planet of Pandora. Trouble soon follows them.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
plot: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

title: The Batman
plot: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
plot: Dr. Stephen Strange casts a forbidden spell that opens the doorway to the multiverse.

title: Jurassic World Dominion
plot: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, dinosaurs now live—and hunt—alongside humans all over the world.

title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
plot: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
plot: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher.

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
plot: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: He has burned through eight of his nine lives.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
plot: The Guardians embark on a mission to protect one of their own that could lead to the end of the team.

title: The Marvels
plot: Carol Danvers, Kamala Khan, and Monica Rambeau team up to save the universe.

title: Oppenheimer
plot: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

title: Barbie
plot: Barbie suffers a crisis that leads her to question her world and her existence.

title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One
plot: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
plot: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table, but before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face a new enemy.

title: Wonka
plot: The story of how Willy Wonka became the greatest inventor, magician and chocolate-maker in the world.

title: Dune: Part Two
plot: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

title: Kung Fu Panda 4
plot: Po faces a new villain and must train a new warrior for the Valley of Peace.

title: Inside Out 2
plot: Riley navigates new emotions as she enters her teenage years.

title: Deadpool 3
plot: Deadpool joins the Marvel Cinematic Universe in a new adventure.

title: Avatar 3
plot: The next chapter in the Avatar saga continues the story of Pandora.

title: Fantastic Four
plot: Marvel's first family of superheroes returns to the big screen.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets is given a chance to have his criminal history erased.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

title: Avatar
plot: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

title: Frozen
plot: When their kingdom is trapped in eternal winter, two sisters must work together to break the curse and save their home.

title: Black Panther
plot: T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king, only to face a new adversary.

title: Interstellar
plot: A group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival on a distant planet.

title: Joker
plot: A failed comedian is driven insane and becomes the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
plot: Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange to erase his secret identity but inadvertently opens the multiverse.

title: Dune
plot: Paul Atreides leads a noble family to the desert planet Arrakis, where they must fight for survival against treacherous forces.

title: One
plot: Paul Atreides leads a noble family to the desert planet Arrakis, where they must fight for survival against treacherous forces.
